title: AI/ML Engineer Associate
summary: Aspiring AI/ML Engineer with a strong foundation in computer science, data science, and proven experience in developing and deploying AI-powered applications. Proficient in machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch, and experienced in data preprocessing, model development, and deployment. Eager to contribute to Relinns Technologies by leveraging AI/ML skills to develop innovative solutions and improve existing AI/ML capabilities. Seeking to apply expertise in Python, data structures, and deep learning to contribute to the development and implementation of machine learning models and algorithms.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description:
Freelance Software Engineer specializing in AI-driven solutions:

*   Designed and developed responsive websites using React.js and Tailwind CSS, ensuring user-centric design and optimal performance.
*   Built and deployed AI applications tailored to user requirements, including sentiment analysis, facial recognition systems, and real-time monitoring tools.
*   Developed and implemented machine learning models for various applications, demonstrating proficiency in model development and deployment.
*   Collaborated with clients to deliver user-centric and efficient solutions, showcasing strong communication and collaboration skills.
*   Utilized Python and relevant libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn) to create and fine-tune machine learning models.

experience.title: Student Teacher
experience.description:
Worked in Shikshan Ganga Team at Shikshanaganga Foundation for the "Project Chote Scientist" program.

*   Collaborated with a team to teach basic science concepts to students in a productive manner.
*   Demonstrated the practical applications of science in daily life, enhancing students' understanding and engagement.
*   Contributed to creating an engaging and educational environment for students.
